title: Determinants of 2×2 and 3×3 Matrices Quiz
description: Test your ability to calculate determinants of small matrices.

questions.question: What is det([1 2 3; 4 5 6; 7 8 9])?
questions.explanation: This matrix is singular with determinant 0.

questions.question: For which matrices is the determinant defined?
questions.explanation: Determinants are only defined for square matrices.

questions.question: What is det(I₃) for the 3×3 identity matrix?
questions.explanation: The determinant of any identity matrix is 1.

questions.question: What does a determinant of 0 indicate?
options: The matrix has all positive elements
questions.explanation: A zero determinant means the matrix is singular and has no inverse.
